snippet: The artist Martha Rosler is mounting a garage sale in the Museum of Modern Art’s atrium; all are welcome to browse and buy.
abstract: Artist Martha Rosler is mounting a garage sale in Museum of Modern Art’s atrium, offering over 14,000 secondhand items that include china and clothing; show is part of museum's embrace of performance in recent years and sign that it is trying to address criticism that women have been underrepresented in its story of art.
lead_paragraph: The artist Martha Rosler is mounting a garage sale in the Museum of Modern Art’s atrium; all are welcome to browse and buy.

headline.seo: Martha Rosler’s ‘Meta-Monumental Garage Sale,’ at MoMA
headline.main: No Picassos, but Plenty of Off-the-Wall Bargains
headline.print_headline: No Picassos, but Plenty of Off-the-Wall Bargains
